Translations.Text: Glorifying God is everything in the heavens and everything on the earth. And He is the Noble, the Wise
O you who believe, why do you say what you do not do
It is most despicable with God that you would say what you do not do
God loves those who fight in His cause as one column; they are like bricks in a wall

And when Moses said to his people: "O my people, why do you harm me, while you know that I am a messenger of God to you?" But when they deviated, God diverted their hearts. And God does not guide the wicked people

And when Jesus, son of Mary, said: "O children of Israel, I am a messenger of God to you, authenticating what is between my hands of the Torah and bringing good news of a messenger to come after me whose name will be 'most acclaimed.'" But when he showed them the clear proofs, they said: "This is clearly magic
And who is more evil than he who invents lies about God, while he is being invited to submission? And God does not guide the wicked people
They want to extinguish the light of God with their mouths. But God will continue with His light, even if the rejecters hate it
He is the One who sent His messenger with the guidance and the system of truth, so that it will expose all other systems, even if the polytheists hate it
